Treasure Island
About the game Treasure Island is a 5 reel, 4 row, 40 bet line video slot. The game features the random triggered Pirate Ship bonus, Treasure Hunt Bonus, Island Hop, and Free Spins with multiple features. Theoretical payout is 97.07%
How to play Video slots are very easy to play. Just follow these 3 steps:
1. Choose your total bet 2. Press the SPIN button 3. Check for any win in the WIN field
For more understanding of Settings, Game Rules, and Game Features read the text below.
Description of game functionality
Bet The Total bet is shown in the TOTAL BET display. Change the bet by clicking on the display and choosing the total bet of your choice. The Total Bet is based on the bet per line multiplied by the number of bet lines active plus the feature bet. The FEATURE BET is always played and enables the Pirate Attack feature. The total bet with the FEATURE BET enabled is the basic bet (the number of bet lines multiplied by the bet per line) plus 10 times the bet per line. As such, the TOTAL BET is 50 x the BET PER LINE.
Spin The game is started by pressing the SPIN button. You can Quick Stop the game by pressing the SPIN button again.
Win Any total win in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field. All wins are multiplied by the bet per line. Bet line wins pay in succession from leftmost to right. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. The separate bet line wins will be displayed on the bet lines during win presentation. In Free Spins only the total win is displayed for each spin.
Paytable All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE.
Fast Play The FAST PLAY functionality is used to get the shortest game round possible. The duration of game rounds may vary depending on bandwidth and server response time.
Autoplay Autoplay allows you to play a number of game rounds automatically Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay. The remaining number of spins is displayed to the right of the STOP button. Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.
Settings In the settings panel at the bottom left of the game you can choose: Use SPACE for spin Use SPACE for spin allows you to use your Space Bar on your keyboard to initiate game rounds.
Show Splash Screen on startup This setting allows you to switch the games Splash Screen on and off.
Special symbols
Wild Symbols The game has five different types of Wild Symbols: - Stacked Wilds, appear in main game and substitute for all symbols except Bonus Scatter, and Barrel Wilds. - Barrel Wilds, appear in main game and free spins and substitute for all symbols except Bonus Scatter. - Extra Wilds, appear in free spins and substitute for all symbols except Barrel Wilds. - SuperWilds, appear in free spins and substitute for all symbols except Barrel Wilds. - Locked Barrel Wilds, appear in free spins and substitute for all symbols except Barrel Wilds.
Scatter Symbol Scatter symbols are not bound to bet lines. Three or more Scatter symbols initiate the Bonus Scatter Pick.
Game Features
Stacked Wilds Wild symbols stacked on each other create the possibilities of major wins.
Pirate Attack Bonus 2 or more Barrel Wild symbols initiated the Pirate Attack Bonus. A pirate ship fires 2 to 4 cannonballs which leave a wild symbol on the position where they hit the reels. If you hit a Barrel Wild it will explode to spread more wild symbols adjacent to the Barrel Wild. The win for the game round is paid when the Pirate Attack Bonus is finished. Barrel Wild symbols substitutes for all symbols except Bonus Scatter symbols. Wilds created in the Pirate Attack bonus substitute for all symbols except for Bonus Scatter symbols and Barrel Wild symbols.
Bonus Scatter Pick Three Bonus Scatter symbols trigger the Bonus Scatter Pick. Pick one of the Scatter symbols to trigger either an Instant Win, Treasure Hunt Bonus, or Free Spins. Bonus Scatter symbols appear on reels 1, 3, and 5.
Treasure Hunt Bonus The Treasure Hunt Bonus is triggered from the Bonus Scatter pick. There are five digging grounds marked with an X on the map. Use your two showels to dig for treasures. All picks award an instant win. One of the five digging grounds hides the Treasure where you enter Ben Gunn's cave and get to choose one of three chests for an extra large reward. The Treasure Hunt ends after both showels have been used.
Free Spins The Free Spins Bonus is triggered from the Bonus Scatter pick. Free Spins start with the Island Hop Bonus where you can win extra free spins, instant wins, and extra features for the Free Spins Bonus. Click on the islands to receive the awards. Island Hop ends when "Start Free Spins" is picked.
The three possible extra features in Free Spins are: Extra Wilds - 1, 2, or 3 of the regular symbols turn into wild symbols for the Free spins round. Extra Wilds substitute for all symbols except Barrel Wild. Super Wilds - Extra wild symbols are added to the Stacked Wilds creating super stacks of wild symbols. Super Wilds substitute for all symbols except Barrel Wild. Locked Barrel Wilds - Wilds from explosions in the Pirate Attack bonus are locked for the remainder of the free spins. Barrel Wilds substitute for all symbols, Locked Barrel Wilds substitute for all symbols except Barrel Wild.
Malfunction in the game voids all pays.
Please place a bet equal to or greater than the minimum bet of %1.

Play with real funds from your account or virtual funds.

You have won the %1 Jackpot! Due to technical problems we are currently unable to add the jackpot to your bankroll automatically. To receive your prize, please contact customer support.
We have not been able to place your bet. Please check your updated balance.
This game is not currently available.

The server is currently undergoing maintenance. Your game should resume automatically in a couple of minutes.
Pick islands to find extra features, prizes and extra free spins
The panel below shows what you will bring into free spins
Up to three regular symbols become wild
Loads of wilds added to the reels
Wilds from explosions lock in place
Pick spots to use your shovel to dig for prizes and find the treasure!
WINS MULTIPLIED BY BET PER LINE. Only the highest win per active betline is paid. Bet line wins pay if in succession from leftmost to right. Malfunction voids all pays.
Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Bonus Scatter symbols, and Barrel Wild symbols.
Three Bonus Scatter symbols trigger the Bonus. Pick one of the Scatters to trigger either a instant win, free spins or the Treasure Hunt Bonus.

The Pirate Attack is triggered by two or more Barrel Wild symbols. The pirate ship shoots 2 or 3 cannonballs which create wild symbols on the reels. If a cannonball hits a Barrel Wild, the Barrel explodes and adds more Wild symbols on the reels.
Barrel Wild symbols substitutes for all symbols except Bonus Scatter symbols. Exploded barrel symbols substitute for all symbols except Bonus Scatter and Barrel Wild symbol.

Free spins is triggered from the Bonus Scatter pick.
The number of free spins awarded and features enabled in the free spins are determined in the Island Hop Bonus Game.

The Island Hop Bonus appears before the free spins. Click on the Islands to receive awards. The awards possible are extra free spins, instant wins and extra features that are enabled in the free spins. The extra features are: Extra Wilds, Super Wilds and Locking Barrel Explosions.
Island Hop Bonus ends when ”START FREE SPINS” is picked.
The free spins feature are rewarded in the Island Hop Bonus. Only one feature can be rewarded per free spin session.
Wilds from Explosions in the Pirate Attack bonus are locked for the remainder of the free spins. Barrel Wilds substitute for all symbols.
The Jim Hawkins, Long John Silver, and/or Captain Flint symbols become Extra Wild symbols for all free spins. Extra Wilds substitute for all symbols except Barrel Wild.
Super Wild symbols are added to the Stacks of Wilds. Super Wilds substitute for all symbols except Barrel Wild.

The Treasure Hunt Bonus is triggered from the Bonus Scatter Pick. There are five “X” on the map to choose from, and two shovels to use for digging. All picks award an instant win.
Find the Treasure spot on the map to choose from three chests for an extra big reward.
The Treasure Hunt ends after both shovels have been used.
